messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, not more than 15 energy draining parasites have stampeded into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention space station 13, due to your station lasting an hour and not being overrun with wumborian fugus like space station 666, your station is being given a possible reward. Stand by for farther news.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention Space Station 13, you are being given three things. One, a centcomm offical android who will monitor your progress. and two objects of your request. Your rewards will arrive at arrivals via ERT Shuttle. We will not announce when they arrive.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention. If you do not choose two objects to be given as a reward-Rodger that. The two objects requested, are two bluespace bananas?..Understood. Await its arrival at arrivals, centcomm out.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: This is a centcomm offical speaking, whoever ordered the bluespace bananas, come to the bar.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hey, uhh... CMO. I found an abandoned Hardsuit. And uhhhh.. The Captain's locker's broken into. How do I uhh... Hhh.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, not more than 15 wire eating mammals have migrated into the [REDACTED].
